org.apache.flink.streaming.api.windowing.assigners

类 MergingWindowAssigner<T,W extends Window>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.streaming.api.windowing.assigners.WindowAssigner<T,W>
      • org.apache.flink.streaming.api.windowing.assigners.MergingWindowAssigner<T,W>
  • 类型参数:
    T - The type of elements that this WindowAssigner can assign windows to.
    W - The type of Window that this assigner assigns.
    所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable
    直接已知子类:
    EventTimeSessionWindows, ProcessingTimeSessionWindows

    @PublicEvolving
public abstract class MergingWindowAssigner<T,W extends Window>
extends WindowAssigner<T,W>
    A WindowAssigner that can merge windows.
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static interface  MergingWindowAssigner.MergeCallback<W>
      Callback to be used in mergeWindows(Collection, MergeCallback) for specifying which windows should be merged.

      • mergeWindows

        public abstract void mergeWindows(java.util.Collection<W> windows,
                                  MergingWindowAssigner.MergeCallback<W> callback)
        Determines which windows (if any) should be merged.
        参数:
        windows - The window candidates.
        callback - A callback that can be invoked to signal which windows should be merged.
